articles.description: Scientists created a harmless version of SARS-CoV-2 and saw it switch shape – to its advantage. This discovery will help researchers to create targeted therapies.
articles.content: Since its discovery in December 2019, the SARS-CoV-2 virus has undergone many changes, giving rise to new variants, including the currently-dominant Omicron variant. It even attacks organs differentl… [+581 chars]
